summary: Adds a bat file to remove all spells from your character
descriptionHtml:
I was looking for a file like this all over the internet but i didn\'t find one and i wasn\'t very thrilled when i noticed that i needed to remove every spell one by one, but then i had the idea of creating a simple bat file :D 

i don\'t know if anyone needs this, but if, it\'s here waiting for you! :)

legal: use it as you want, freely 

Until now i couldn\'t figure out how to remove the flames and healing spell. 

A big big thank you to Neliana. If you don\'t want flames/healing at the game start, download her mod: 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13344 
which alters the quest stage in the beginning, so it doesn\'t add said spells.
author: Anubis100
